parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post includes the CMF number 11240002, indicating it is electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post explicitly refers to Hubert Thuma and Nicoleta Pauliuc, both candidates from the PNL party, by name and their positions within the party.  It also clearly indicates their position on the ballot (Position 1).</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide audience in Ilfov County, not a private communication. The message is clearly intended for public consumption.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters in Ilfov County to vote for the PNL candidates (Hubert Thuma and Nicoleta Pauliuc), explicitly stating "Ilfovenii votează PNL, poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!" (Ilfov residents vote PNL, position 1 on the ballot!). This directly aims to influence the electoral outcome.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: While the post contains some factual information (budget details), its primary purpose is not journalistic. It lacks objectivity and is clearly designed as a persuasive advertisement to promote specific candidates and the PNL party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The post does not express personal opinions; instead, it promotes a political party and its candidates, urging voters to support them.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>572535765367817</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 572535765367817, fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to specific PNL candidates (Hubert Thuma and Nicoleta Pauliuc), uses their images, and explicitly encourages voters to choose them. The post's targeting and paid nature confirm its intention to reach a wide audience with an electoral objective.  The presence of the CMF number further solidifies its classification as electoral propaganda. The post's content goes beyond simple information; it is a clear call to action, urging voters to support the PNL.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Hubert Thuma</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Nicoleta Pauliuc</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul Național Liberal, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 572535765367817) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidații PNL Hubert Thuma și Nicoleta Pauliuc, îndemnând explicit la votarea acestora prin fraza "Ilfovenii votează PNL, poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!",  având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților menționați. Postarea, marcată cu CMF 11240002, depășește limitele jurnalismului și constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
